definition: an overall plan taking into account all factors
chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
double/twice/simultaneous/holding two or more (official) posts at the same time
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: Compared with other methods, this approach has better overall consideration.
sentences.chinese: 與有關方法比較，該方法具有很好的統籌兼顧性。

sentences.english: Fourth, adopt a holistic approach for comprehensive and balanced growth.
sentences.chinese: 第四，統籌兼顧，實現全面均衡發展。

sentences.english: But spending cuts must be balanced with more reforms to our tax code.
sentences.chinese: 但是削減開支必須統籌兼顧，競選更多的稅法改革。

sentences.english: Third, follow a holistic approach and advocate inclusive growth.
sentences.chinese: 第三，統籌兼顧，倡導包容性增長。
